page.title: 10SCHOOLS IN MAWNAN
page.content: The old school was built in 1834.By 1971 it was too small and in a bad state.In 1972 a{new school}was built. In 1985 there are 120 pupils in the school with 4 full time teachers including headmaster and 2 part time. There are 2 dinner ladies who cook the dinner and an ancillary who looks after the rising 5's and a caretaker. I think Mawnan School is a good school and helps you enjoy learning.We also have lots of{equipment}including: 2 BBC computers with monitors and disc drives,a video,television and tape recorders.PE apparatus including gymnastic equipment.Pottery wheel and kiln,cookers,woodwork tools,2 librarys,netball and football pitch,a weedy pond,sand pit for long jump,musical eqipment includes drum kit and key board.Children leave to go to Penryn,Falmouth or Truro schools.
